description: Finding and whittling the classic forked stick takes time – time better spent cooking. These one-piece wire gizmos slip securely over the end of almost any stick to hold your food and marshmallows firmly above the flames.2-pack allows mass production and cooking to individual taste.Forks are stainless steel spring wire.Safety caps are made of durable sugarcane- and wood fibre-based HDPE that's safe for microwaves and dishwashers.Curved points hold food firmly.
name: Light My Fire Grandpa's FireFork 2 pack BIO-Plastic
